title.rendered: West Indies Women vs England Women: Fantasy Cricket Team, Pitch Report, Playing XIs & Top Fantasy Tips for the 3rd ODI

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable Playing XIs for West Indies & England

Probable XI for West Indies: Hayley Matthews (c), Aaliyah Alleyne, Kycia Knight (wk), Rashada Williams, Shemaine Campbelle, Chedean Nation, Shabika Gajnabi, Chinelle Henry, Afy Fletcher, Cherry Ann Fraser, Sheneta Grimmond

Probable XI for England: Tammy Beaumont, Emma Lamb, Sophia Dunkley, Natalie Sciver, Heather Knight (c), Amy Jones (wk), Danielle Wyatt, Sophie Ecclestone, Charlotte Dean, Kate Cross, Lauren Bell

Pitch Report for West Indies Women vs England Women, 3rd ODI

Venue: Sir Vivian Richards Stadium, North Sound, Antigua

(Based on the last 2 games)

1st innings average score: 284

2nd innings average score: 142

Wickets per innings: 9

Type: Slow and sluggish.

Weather: Clear.

Wins

Batting 1st: 100%

Batting 2nd: —

Also Read:

How to choose a captain for your fantasy team

Fantasy Tips of The Day

England’s players have generated more bonus points through boundary-hitting as compared to the West Indians. While the visitors have hit 48 fours and 3 sixes, the hosts have managed only 19 fours and a solitary six.

In comparison to the consistency of the West Indian bowlers, their batters have been anything but erratic.

Interestingly, wicketkeepers Amy Jones and Kycia Knight have stood tall with both bat and gloves for their respective sides. While Jones has added 100 runs to go with 4 dismissals with the gloves, Knight has collected 39 runs and inflicted 3 dismissals behind the wickets.

Ready with your squad? Create your team on My11Circle Fantasy Cricket App now!
